title: ClipLink - URL Shortener
description: A modern URL shortener built with clean architecture, leveraging Astro's islands architecture and server-side rendering for high performance. Features include Google and GitHub authentication, seamless view transitions, dark and light mode support, pagination, and a powerful search engine. Designed for scalability and optimized for an exceptional user experience. Additionally, the project includes a comprehensive suite of unit tests that ensure code reliability, maintainability, and long-term stability.

title: Vue Pokedex
description: Pokedex made with Vue 3 and Bootstrap consuming PokeAPI. It has a search engine, infinite scroll and a detail page for each Pokemon. Responsive design. It is deployed on Vercel.
